forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds this morning. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low 56F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
